text: Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata gata wa izen ni itta, Jin to ningen no ichidan to tomoni hi goku ni ire.' Soshite ichidan ga hi goku ni hairu tabi ni, kanarazu (saki ni itta) nakama no ichidan o norou. Zenbu no mono ga, tsugitsugini sono nakanihairu to,-go no ichidan wa saisho no ichidan o sashite iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o mayowa seta no wa, korera no monodesu. Dakara 2-bai no hi goku no keibatsu o ataete kudasai.' Kare wa ose rareyou. `Dare mo mina 2-bai (no keibatsu ga) atae rareyou. Daga anata gata wa sore o shiranai
